article_title: Hezbollah Leader Vows Retaliation for Militant’s Death
article_text:
BEIRUT—The leader of Iran-backed Lebanese militia Hezbollah vowed on Monday to retaliate against Israel for allegedly killing one of the group’s senior militants in Syria over the weekend, while belittling increased U.S. sanctions against his organization.

“The martyr Samir Kantar is one of us and a leader in our resistance and the Israelis have killed him for sure,” Hassan Nasrallah said in a speech aired on Hezbollah’s television station Al-Manar. “It’s our right to retaliate for his assassination in the place, time and...
